title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.10 - Appearance at Conferences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.10 - Appearance at Conferences

State Regulations
(a) Any
party may request to appear at a conference by electronic means. Where feasible
and appropriate, the court is encouraged to grant such requests. (b) Adjournments of conferences shall be
granted upon a showing of good cause. An adjournment of a conference will not
change any date in any court order, including but not limited to the
preliminary conference order, unless otherwise directed by the court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
202.10

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/1/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
